text: Magdaléna Vášáryová (; also known as Magda Vášáryová ; born 26 August 1948) is a Slovak actress and politician. She was ambassador of Czechoslovakia in Austria from 1990 until 1993 and to Poland from 2000 until 2005. She unsuccessfully ran of President of Slovakia in the 1999 presidential election. In 2006, she was elected to the National Council of the Slovak Republic for Slovak Democratic and Christian Union - Democratic Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Profile as a 2006 election candidate * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak actors Category:Slovak politicians Category:Ambassadors Category:European diplomats
title: Magdaléna Vášáryová
